byline.contributor: Joe Coscarelli and John Surico contributed reporting.
byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER MELE and SANDRA E. GARCIA

abstract: One man is fatally shot and three people wounded when gunfire breaks out before concert by rapper TI at Irving Plaza in Manhattan; motive for shooting remains unclear and no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: A 33-year-old man died, and three other people were wounded at Irving Plaza as panicked concertgoers streamed for the exits.

headline.main: Shooting at T.I. Concert in New York Kills One
headline.print_headline: One Fatally Shot and Three Wounded During Concert

snippet: A 33-year-old man died, and three other people were wounded at Irving Plaza as panicked concertgoers streamed for the exits.
